message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be fair to propose a price of $950000 for this exceptional item.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $850000?
Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering the value and quality of the product, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $900000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $875000 for the product.
I understand your position, Bob. My counteroffer is now $925000 for the product. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $887500 for the product. This aligns more closely with my budget expectations.
Considering the value of the product and your recent proposal, I am willing to consider $912500 as a final offer. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to move forward.
I appreciate your efforts to meet my budgetary needs, Alice. In light of this, I would like to propose a final offer of $896250 for the product.
After reviewing your latest offer, I am prepared to finalize the transaction at $906250 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise while respecting its value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to conclude our negotiations with a final offer of $891875 for the product.
